sha bo he Practicing this method,
use a rope made of black sheep's wool, chant the mantra seven times, and tie it to the left arm.
If there is no sheep's wool, use black thread.
If there is a fever lasting three or four days,
chant the mantra on a black thread and tie it to the left arm.
If there is a headache, chant the mantra seven times and rub it.
If the eyes hurt, chant the mantra on a white thread and tie it to the ear.ğŸ”½If there is an earache, chant the mantra on soil seven times and stuff it in the ear.
If the teeth hurt, chant the mantra on willow branches seven times and chew them.
If there is a stomachache, chant the mantra on salt water seven times and drink it.
If there is difficulty in childbirth, chant the mantra on a black thread seven times and tie it around the neck, then it will be easy.
If one's previous food is undigested, by massaging with the hand while reciting the spell, one will immediately vomit and have diarrhea.
One can also protect oneself and not fear water, fire, weapons, poison, or beasts.
None of them can harm one.

The method of practice:
In front of an image of AvalokiteÅ›vara, smear the ground with fragrant mud.
Make offerings of incense and flowers, reciting six times a day, one hundred and twenty times each time.
AvalokiteÅ›vara will manifest his body to the practitioner and allow them to see it.
All that is sought will be accomplished as wished.ğŸ”½The Buddha Speaks the Rain-Seeking DhÄraá¹‡Ä«: Namo tun-tou-pi
Bodhisattva sattva namas sarva sattva namas sarva buddha namas
Need twenty-eight blue banners placed in four boxes.
Seven large banners, one erected in the center.
Each of the four boxes has seven blue seats, with seven plates of cakes, rice, fruits, raisins, rock sugar, pomegranate juice, ghee, curd, and honey as offerings.
Cleanly bathe, wear new clean blue clothes and shoes, and a hat.
Burn agarwood, white sandalwood, frankincense, tagara, priyangu, and camphor.
Scatter blue flowers and fast for three days.
In the center, spread blue cushions.
Facing east on the seat, recite one hundred and eight times.
Up to one thousand and eighty times, it will definitely rain.
Plead with a focused mind, taking getting rain as the limit.
If the offerings are complete but one is unable to afford them,
one can set up offerings as one wishes, with one or two kinds of incense also acceptable.
Just recite the mantra with utmost sincerity.
If one is unable to afford a bed,
one must also set up a banner and a dish, and wear blue clothes.

Sha-ha The Buddha Speaks the Divine Spell for Eliminating the Ten Evils Wei-tuo-li
If one has a headache, chant sesame oil twenty-one times and apply it to the head.
If one has an eye pain, chant black thread twenty-one times, make fourteen knots, and tie it around the head and neck.
If one has an earache, chant birch bark knots and insert them.ğŸ”½If one has a toothache, chant water twenty-one times and gargle.
If one has a stomachache, chant salt water twenty-one times and drink it.
If a woman is in labor, chant twenty-one times and tie her hair.
If a man has a urinary problem with white discharge like chalk water,
chant his footprints twenty-one times, apply the soil to his body, and sprinkle it on him.
If one is involved in a dispute and argues with others,
chant one jujube fruit twenty-one times and carry it with you.
If one encounters misfortune and is imprisoned,
chant white thread twenty-one times, make twenty-one knots, and insert it into the ears.

The heavy karmic hindrances from beginningless time.

The Buddha said, If one wishes to read and recite all the scriptures, one should first recite this dharani: Tadyatha Muni Dimi Sangkaraka Zumi Anuchakara Dimi Vimu Dimi Satoda Anuchakara Dimi Beshi La Maknang Dimi Sammuda Anuchavari Vratta Dimi Qunang Karaka Sangkaraka Dimi Savaruna Kshanta Dimi Savaga Lapa Vari Vara Sha Nang Dimi Smetri Vritta Anupama Sha Dimi If one wishes to read and recite all the scriptures,
one should first recite this dharani.
Then, when reading and reciting, one will remember without forgetting.
The Dharani for Binding and Protecting Against Soldiers and Thieves: Uha Wuha Marichi Chira Shousha Hala Idhi Wu Di Zhe Ha Hala Su I bind and release, and then protect the soldiers and myself.
If you encounter capture by the county officials,
Recite the mantra by the side twenty-seven times and tie it to your belt.
After tying it, recite the mantra by the side and take it with you. You will attain peace and safety. Untie the belt.
This mantra is very effective. Always read it with a pure and focused mind.ğŸ”½DhÄraá¹‡Ä« for Toothache: Namo Buddha, Namo Dharma, Namo Bhiká¹£u Saá¹…gha.

In the north, on the MahÄyÄna mountain of Kaá¹‡á¹­aka,
There is a worm king named HÄ«mavata.
He will send messengers who dare not eat the teeth, the roots of the teeth, the middle of the teeth, or the sides of the teeth. The worms will immediately descend into the vessel.
The head will be shattered into seven pieces.
Like RÄhula, the Brahma Heaven assists in this mantra, Namo Buddha.
May what I chant be accomplished as I wish.
Swallow pure water while chanting once.
Recite the mantra seven times into the water-spitting vessel to stop it.
DhÄraá¹‡Ä« for Ending Rain from the Great Cloud SÅ«tra At that time, by the World-Honored One's spiritual power,
Four black clouds arose, and sweet rain fell everywhere.
Three kinds of clouds were produced, namely lower, middle, and upper.
Sweet rain sounds arose like heavenly music.
All sentient beings delight in hearing it.
At that time, the World-Honored One then spoke the mantra, saying:

Do not bring down sweet rain, their heads will break into seven pieces.
At that time, the ten koá¹­is of nayutas of incalculable kalpas of the buddhas.
At that time, the worlds of the buddhas in the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, shook in six ways.
At that time, the sentient beings, due to this shaking of the earth,
They continued to shake each other until they reached the Pure Abodes.
When the Pure Abodes shook, the dragon clouds shook together.
When the dragon clouds shook, they rained down heavily.
At that time, in the world of JambudvÄ«pa, there were ninety-eight thousand great rivers,
All the ponds were filled with medicinal herbs.
Although the rain of flavors rained for seven days, it did no further harm.
The sentient beings were happy as if they had ingested sweet dew.
The rivers were filled with the eight kinds of merits of water.
Namely, beautiful, cool, light, soft, pure, fragrant, clean,
when drinking, it is comfortable, and after drinking, there are no afflictions.
All the water insects emitted subtle sounds.
At that time, in the city of RÄjagá¹›ha, on Gá¹›dhrakÅ«á¹­a Mountain,
the seven treasures covered the ground without any empty spaces.
The sky also rained down lotuses made of the seven treasures, such as blue lotuses, red lotuses, white lotuses, and white water lilies.
All of them gave rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment.
The sentient beings of the animal realm enjoyed the Mahayana and thirsted for the Mahayana.
They looked upon each other with a compassionate mind, just like a single child.
The bhiká¹£us made offerings to the Buddha with the same mind.
One should quickly use four long twelve-foot stakes, and the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« spell.
With this spell, use four strands of five-colored thread.
Recite the spell twenty-one times for each strand.

This dhÄraá¹‡Ä« method requires burning aloeswood incense.
If there are any incomplete features,
chant the mantra over grass one hundred and eight times and the faculties will be complete.
If the feet, hands, ears, eyes, or nose are missing,

By the power of this mantra, all of them can be protected.

The Buddha Speaks the Sutra of Mantra Soil, this is a spurious sutra. The mantra collector did not know and falsely collected it here. The Buddha said, If there is illness, the qi of the soil, the house, and the room should be first established.
Read the mantra three times, burn incense and make offerings, and then.
You should dig the soil without any taboo. The Buddha said.
The gods and ghost kings of the ten directions, heaven and earth.
The sun, moon, five stars, and twenty-eight lunar mansions.
All of them should listen clearly.
The Buddha said, Today, for the sake of so-and-so.
Supervise the house, establish the room, and repair the doors, wells, stoves, mortars, mills, grinders, and granaries.
The east wing, west wing, south courtyard, and north hall.
The six domestic animals make a pen.
Now, for the sake of so-and-so, it is decreed.
The wandering moon kills the five soil god prefectures, the generals.
The gods of the four seasons, the blue dragon, white tiger, vermilion bird, and Xuanwu, the monthly killing, the six jia taboos.
The twelve gods, the soil prefectures, and the hidden dragons.
Each should be placed in its proper place, do not forget east and west.
If there is movement or stillness, burn incense and make a request.
The Buddha has important words, do not rashly interact with each other.
The head will break into seven pieces, the body will not be complete.
Do not leave one's original position with water or food.
Recite the urgent spell according to the rules.
Cause people's halls and houses to be eternally peaceful and the house to be completed.
Wealth, nobility, auspicious relocation, coming and going to join the army.
Soldiers and officials should be officials and earn profits from their livelihood.
People have no illnesses, the family gate is prosperous.
Daily abundance of a hundred sons and a thousand grandchildren.
The twenty-five spirits guard the family gate.
County officials, thieves, and disasters do not come before.
Disasters and strange events are eliminated, and resentment does not arise.ğŸ”½The father is kind, the son is filial, the ancestor is wise, and the grandson is obedient.
The man is loyal, the woman is chaste, the elder brother is good, and the younger brother is respectful.
Righteousness yields, humility, the husband is harmonious, and the wife is gentle.
Enmity and righteousness are close, and one obtains the wishes of the heart, and whatever one goes towards is accomplished.
It should cause the body to be examined, and a hundred illnesses are eliminated.
One's conduct is like a bodhisattva, and one attains the Way like a Buddha.
